attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election in order that WE can show our ire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current daily media attention on corruption, it is now time for the average voter to be given the chance to register their anger at their greed and contempt for the voting public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
